{"id":1097195203,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 days, 9 hours","timestamp":1699786726,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"42 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1097195203/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Distribute Candies Among Children I","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n          int ans=0;\n    \nvoid fxn(int sum , int ind,vector<int>&v,int l){\n  if(ind>2||sum<0)return;\n    if(ind==3||sum==0){\n        \n       int f=0;\n    \n        for(int i=0;i<3;i++ ){\n            if(v[i]>l)f=1;\n        }\n        if(f==0){ans++;\n                }\n        return ;\n    }\n   \n    v[ind]++;\n    fxn(sum-1,ind,v,l);\n    v[ind]--;\n    fxn(sum,ind+1,v,l);\n}\n    int distributeCandies(int n, int limit) {\n        vector<int>v(3,0);\n    fxn(n,0,v,limit);\n    return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"distribute-candies-among-children-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
